 True if we are going to step into ISR's.

Field Documentation

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::active_cores

Bitmask of cores that should stop on a breakpoint.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::command

Command for all cores (cvmx_debug_command_t).

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::core_finished

True if a core has finished and not been processed yet.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::ever_been_in_debug

True if we have been ever been in the debugger stub at all.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::focus_core

Core currently under control of the debugger.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::focus_switch

Focus can be switched.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::handler_cores

Bitmask of cores currently running the exception handler.

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::known_cores
uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::step_all

True if step and continue should affect all cores.

False, only the focus core is affected

uint64_t cvmx_debug_state_t::step_isr

True if we are going to step into ISR's.
